dct_title_s: Tectonic map of South America = Mapa tectónico de América del Sur = Mapa tectônico da América do Sul / Commission for the Geological Map of the World/Commission de la carte géologique du monde ; general coordinators, Umberto G. Cordani, Victor A. Ramos ; deputy-coordinators,  Lêda Maria Fraga, Marcelo Cegarra, Inácio Delgado ; offshore areas, Kaiser G. de Souza, Francisco Edson M. Gomes ; digital cartography was mainly carried out by Michel Fraga.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading and bathymetric tints. Map coordinates show S 50° rather than S 56° (which is correct) as southernmost latitude. "Coordinate system: World polyconic." Shows tectonic settings of South America and surrounding oceanic plates, geologic and tectonic features, national capitals, bodies of water, and other details. Includes text, abd geologic time scale. Ancillary maps: Main tectonic elements of South America -- Schematic West Gondwana reconstruction. "USP, Universidade do São Paulo; Universidad de Buenos Aires"--Panel.
dct_creator_sm: Commission for the Geological Map of the World
